curam.util.resources

Interface EnvironmentConstants.Rules

  • Enclosing interface:
    EnvironmentConstants

    public static interface EnvironmentConstants.Rules
    These settings configure the rules infrastructure of Curam.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String kRulesDebug
      Default: false.
      static java.lang.String kRulesDefaultLocale
      Default: en_US.
      static java.lang.String kRulesEmptyObjectiveListGroups
      Default: true.
      static java.lang.String kRulesFileAccessLocation
      The directory where the XML representation of rule sets will be created.
      static java.lang.String kRulesFileAccessMultilocation
      Specifies that rule set files exist in multiple locations.
      static java.lang.String kRulesFullText
      Specifies the rules engine construction of full result text.
      static java.lang.String kRulesGlobalsDescription
      The display/user friendly name associated with the pre-defined Globals Rules Data Object.
      static java.lang.String kRulesModelFileRDOAccess
      Specifies that RDOs should be retrieved from a Curam model file.
      static java.lang.String kRulesObjectiveCalculationDateIncludedInDateRange
      Specifies the new objective calculation.
      static java.lang.String kRulesOptimization
      Specifies the rules optimization.
      static java.lang.String kRulesRelatedReferenceWorkaround
      Default: false.

      • kRulesDefaultLocale

        static final java.lang.String kRulesDefaultLocale
        Default: en_US. Default locale used when creating the XML representation of rule sets. Property name : curam.rules.default.locale
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • kRulesGlobalsDescription

        static final java.lang.String kRulesGlobalsDescription
        The display/user friendly name associated with the pre-defined Globals Rules Data Object. The default value is the localized message text associated with the infrastructure catalog entry: RULES:ID_GROUP_DISPLAY_NAME_GLOBALS Property name : curam.rules.globals.description
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • kRulesOptimization

        static final java.lang.String kRulesOptimization
        Specifies the rules optimization. Property name : curam.rules.enable.optimization
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • kRulesFullText

        static final java.lang.String kRulesFullText
        Specifies the rules engine construction of full result text. Property name : curam.rules.enable.fulltext
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • kRulesDebug

        static final java.lang.String kRulesDebug
        Default: false. Specify whether the rules debugging should be enabled. Property name : curam.debug.rules
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • kRulesEmptyObjectiveListGroups

        static final java.lang.String kRulesEmptyObjectiveListGroups
        Default: true. Specify whether the rules decision should include empty Objective list groups. Property name : curam.disable.empty.objectivelistgroups
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • kRulesRelatedReferenceWorkaround

        static final java.lang.String kRulesRelatedReferenceWorkaround
        Default: false. Specify whether the Objective related reference values should be stored in the tag values to fix the issues with financial amount calculation. Property name : curam.classicrules.relatedreference.compatabilityworkaround
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • kRulesObjectiveCalculationDateIncludedInDateRange

        static final java.lang.String kRulesObjectiveCalculationDateIncludedInDateRange
        Specifies the new objective calculation. Property name : curam.rules.date.range.includes.calculation.date
